name: Rock Paper Scissors Extreme
description:
This game requires a keyboard + 2 controllers, or 3 controllers.

If you are rock, try to collide with scissors.

If you are paper, try to collide with rock.

If you are scissors, try to collide with paper.

Chase your target around the map while avoiding your hunter. 

You can also dash. 

First to ten points wins.

WARNING: DO NOT COLLIDE WITH EACH OTHER BEFORE ALL THREE PLAYERS HAVE JOINED. THIS WILL BREAK THE GAME.
